    void
    render()
    Do not call this method, merely override it. This method is called by DoaEngine when: This renderer is added to a DoaObject, The DoaObject this renderer is added to, is added to a DoaScene, The DoaScene the DoaObject this renderer is added to, is loaded. Use the appropriate functions in DoaGraphicsFunctions to draw onto the screen.

  • Field Details

    • rect

      protected Rectangle rect
      The rectangle this renderer will render.

    • color

      protected Color color
      The color in which the shape will be rendered. Default value is Color.PINK.

    • fill

      protected boolean fill
      When true, the shape will be filled, when false, the shape will only be drawn. Default value is true.

  • Method Details

    • setOffset

      public void setOffset​(@NotNull @NotNull DoaVector offset)
      Sets the offset of the rectangle. The offset is calculated from the owner of this renderer's transform's position.
      Parameters:
      offset - offset of this renderer

    • setDimensions

      public void setDimensions​(@NotNull @NotNull DoaVector dimensions)
      Sets the dimensions of this rectangle.
      Parameters:
      dimensions - dimensions of rectangle

      public boolean getFill()

    • render

      public void render()
      Do not call this method, merely override it. This method is called by DoaEngine when:
      1. This renderer is added to a DoaObject,
      2. The DoaObject this renderer is added to, is added to a DoaScene,
      3. The DoaScene the DoaObject this renderer is added to, is loaded.
      Use the appropriate functions in DoaGraphicsFunctions to draw onto the screen.
      Specified by:
      render in class DoaRenderer
